pageSubtitle: Instructions for monitoring data quality and enumerator performance
title: How It Works
overviewText: This portal helps you supervise data collection from enumerators. You can review submissions for quality issues, update validation status, and monitor performance metrics to guide continuous improvement.
monitorDescription: Track enumerator activity and data quality metrics
reviewDescription: Examine submissions flagged with data quality issues
validateDescription: Approve data and provide feedback for improvement
validationDescription: Review individual submissions and update validation status based on data quality.
validationBullet1: Search and filter submissions by status, survey, date, or alert
validationBullet2: View submission details including vessel, catch, and enumerator info
validationBullet3: Identify data quality issues flagged by alert codes
validationBullet4: Approve or reject submissions directly from the table
performanceDescription: Monitor performance metrics and identify areas requiring attention or training.
performanceBullet1: Track submission volume and quality trends over time
performanceBullet2: Compare enumerators by quality scores and alert frequency
performanceBullet3: Analyze alert distribution to spot common issues
performanceBullet4: Focus training based on data-driven insights
workflowDescription: Follow these steps to review and validate data submissions
step1Description: Navigate to "Validation" in the top menu to view all submissions
step2Description: Look for submissions marked with red alert badges indicating potential data issues
step3Description: Click on a submission to examine the data and verify accuracy
step4Description: Set status as Approved or Not Approved based on your review
step5Description: Communicate findings and improvement areas using the Enumerator Performance page
alertFlagsDescription: Automatic indicators that highlight potential data quality issues requiring review.
alertFlagsNote: Note: Alert flags are automated warnings. Final validation decisions are made by you.
validationStatusDescription: Your decision on the accuracy and acceptability of submitted data.
validationStatusNote: Note: Review data thoroughly before updating validation status.
assistanceText: Contact your system administrator for technical support or questions about using this portal.
